block.name: M-PSK Detector Soft Symbols (CCSDS)
block.doc:
M-PSK symbol detector.
Take a complex M-PSK symbol map it to the nearest byte in range 0 to M-1. The decisions are derived based on the phase value of the incoming signal. Output a confidence value for each output symbol in the range of [0,2^quant_bits).
M: Number of modulation symbols.
quant_bits: Number of bits used for quantization of the confidence value. Must be in range of [1,8].
